citeinfo.origin: Graduate School of Science, Tohoku University, Japan
citeinfo.title: Expendable Bathythermograph (XBT) Data by Tohoku University in NEAR-GOOS Regional Delayed Mode Data Base (RDMDB)

abstract.p: Expendable Bathythermograph (XBT) data observed by Tohoku University. The data observed after October 2000 are uploaded on J-DOSS at http://www.jodc.go.jp/service.htm.

Data sets may be obtained directly from the North-East Asian Regional - Global Ocean Observing System (NEAR-GOOS) Regional Delayed Mode Data Base (RDMDB) at http://near-goos1.jodc.go.jp/ with a user account. First time users must register to gain database access.

descript.purpose: To offer basic data service to NEAR-GOOS and GOOS communities as part of the NEAR-GOOS project.

idinfo.accconst: First time users must register to gain database access.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metac: First time users must register to gain database access.
